fields.description: The name of the Training Type.
Indicates if the training type is inactive.  If a training type is inactive, it will no longer be allowed to be selected when a user enters or updates their training.

Inactive.description: Indicates if the training type is inactive.  If a training type is inactive, it will no longer be allowed to be selected when a user enters or updates their training.

Training_Type_Name.description: The name of the Training Type.
